build.buildCommand: composer install && touch database/database.sqlite && chmod 777 database/database.sqlite && chmod -R 777 storage && npm install && npm install sass --save-dev && npm run build

deploy.startCommand: php artisan config:clear && PHP_CLI_SERVER_WORKERS=1 php -d display_errors=1 -d error_reporting=E_ALL artisan serve --host=0.0.0.0 --port=$PORT
